name: Where’s My Water? Cranky’s Story
summary: Cranky's Story is an optional In-App Purchase that has four chapters and eight challenge sets. In this story, the player helps Cranky clean Algae off his food. Cranky is the sewer's most hungry Alligator. Cranky is relying on an old pipe that puts out Poison Water to clean away the Algae.
